bilingual.source: The arcade is offering discounts on weekends.
bilingual.target: 这家游戏厅周末提供折扣。

bilingual.source: She is offering her help to those in need.
bilingual.target: 她正在提供帮助给那些需要帮助的人。

bilingual.source: This company is known for offering a high salary.
bilingual.target: 这家公司以提供高薪而闻名。

bilingual.source: He is offering his seat to the elderly woman.
bilingual.target: 他正在提供他的座位给那位老年妇女。

bilingual.source: They are offering a special sale on electronics.
bilingual.target: 他们在电子产品上提供特别出售。

bilingual.source: The company is offering a new product this year.
bilingual.target: 该公司今年正在提供一款新产品。

bilingual.source: The government is offering support to the unemployed.
bilingual.target: 政府正在为失业者提供支持。

bilingual.source: The government is offering incentives to small firms.
bilingual.target: 政府正在为小公司提供激励措施。

bilingual.source: He enfolded her in his arms, offering comfort and warmth.
bilingual.target: 他拥抱她，提供安慰和温暖。

yingyinNormal.en: So you're offering us a chance to short this pile of blocks? How?
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以你要提供给我们机会做空这堆积木，怎么实施？

yingyinNormal.en: We are offering you a new phone, as older flip-model phones such as yours have been degraded.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们将为您提供新手机，因为您旧型号的翻盖手机已经落后了。

yingyinNormal.en: It's even started offering software called "Facebook Platform" that allows anyone to launch a business online.
yingyinNormal.zh: 甚至开始可以为人们提供一种叫做"脸书平台"的软件了，它可以让任何人都可以在网上经营自己的事业。

yingyinNormal.en: Steve told me he's offering you a new contract. Yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 史蒂夫告诉我他和你签了份新合同。是的。

yingyinNormal.en: You're offering us $800,000? No, we're suing you for $800,000.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你愿意给我们80万美金？不，我们起诉你们要求80万赔偿。

yingyinNormal.en: Why don't you slip this on? Said the hangman offering a noose.
yingyinNormal.zh: 试试这件吧。就跟绞刑吏来送绞索一样。

yingyinNormal.en: Only in this case, I am offering you the opportunity to become a Kingsman.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在，我要给你一个为皇家服务的机会。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a popular London attraction, offering tours of staterooms and gardens.
yingyinNormal.zh: 皇宫是伦敦的旅游热点，导览团会带游客参观客房和花园。

yingyinNormal.en: I was just with her an hour ago. You were the one on the phone offering her a job. My job?
yingyinNormal.zh: 可我一小时前才刚跟她谈过，你就是电话那头给她工作的人吗？要取代我吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I think we should merge. I disagree. They're offering us equal spots on management committees.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得我们应该合并。我不同意。他们给予我们一半的管理委员会席位。

yingyinNormal.en: Why do you think he's offering it to you? He wants someone he can influence. Someone that he knows.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你觉得他为什么要提拔你？因为他想找个能支配的人，一个他知根知底的人。

yingyinNormal.en: But I will take something to eat. Thank you for offering. What? You still know how to cook, don't you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不过我会吃点东西，谢谢你的招待，什么？难道你还没学会做菜？

yingyinNormal.en: A peace offering. It's the Beatrice Lillie from Park's Deli, including the extra ingredients you enjoy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 求和礼物，从公园熟食店买的毕翠丝·莉莉，额外加了你喜欢的料。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, I know. I've been offering to show you around for a year and a half. You always said you had yoga.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我当然知道，这一年半我一直说要带你来看看，你总是说你要去练瑜伽。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, I know you guys are a family. So I'm offering you a chance right now to make that family whole again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道你们亲如一家，那我现在就给你们一个机会，让你们重新团聚。

yingyinNormal.en: Let me put it this way. I'm standing in front of a burning house, and I'm offering you fire insurance on it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这么说吧，我站在着火的房子面前问你买不买火险。

yingyinNormal.en: What was that? You said be nice to Penny. I believe offering chocolate to someone falls within the definition of nice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这算什么？你让我对佩妮好点的，我觉得给别人喂巧克力能够符合“好”的定义。

yingyinNormal.en: He was clear that those who speak the name of Hashshashin were offering their heads to these assassins who are very much alive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他很确定那些谈及哈沙辛这个名字的人，他们都是效忠于那些刺客的，那些刺客很可能还活着。

yingyinNormal.en: Thank you, thank you very much. I know that all of you join me in offering our sincere condolences to the First Lady for her loss.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢谢，非常感谢大家，我知道，大家和我一样，都对第一夫人亲人的离世表示诚挚慰唁。

yingyinNormal.en: Sounds great! I'm in! Hold on. Just because the nice man is offering you candy, doesn't mean you should jump into his windowless van.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听起来很赞啊！我去！慢着，就因为一位怪蜀黍给你们糖吃，并不意味着你就应该跳进人贩子的破车里。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 用品; 剧作; 作品; 供消遣的产品

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 赠品；捐赠物品；祭品；贡品；产品；捐助；捐赠物

sense_info_list.en: something that is produced for other people to use, watch, enjoy etc.
sense_info_list.zh: 用品; 剧作; 作品; 供消遣的产品

examination_example.sentence: The egg industry's push is the first major test of whether animal products from regenerative farms can become the next premium <highlight>offering</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 蛋业的推动是对再生农场的动物产品能否成为下一个优质产品的首次重大考验。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 用品; 剧作; 作品; 供消遣的产品

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 赠品；捐赠物品；祭品；贡品；产品；捐助；捐赠物

sense_info_list.en: something that is produced for other people to use, watch, enjoy etc.
sense_info_list.zh: 用品; 剧作; 作品; 供消遣的产品

examination_example.sentence: These companies, which long reaped big profits as textbook publishers, have boasted that their new online <highlight>offerings</highlight>, when pushed to students through universities they partner with, represent the future of the industry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些长期以来一直作为教科书出版商，并获得丰厚利润的公司吹嘘说，当他们通过与他们合作的大学将其推向学生时，他们的新在线产品代表了该行业的未来。

examination_example.sentence: The report uses the term to refer to cities which are "positioning themselves as highly competitive, in terms of livability and employment <highlight>offerings</highlight>."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 报告用这一术语指代那些“认为自己在宜居性和所能提供的就业机会方面都非常具有竞争力”的城市。

examination_example.sentence: Over the past three decades, the industry has made some efforts to improve the quality of its <highlight>offerings</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在过去的三十年里，该行业做出了一些努力来提高其产品的质量。

sample.mean: v. 得罪；冒犯；犯罪；令人不快；违反
n. 违法；犯规；犯罪；恼怒；怨恨；进攻
